settings: {"anno_x_enabled":false,"anno_y_enabled":true,"anno_y_lines":"五年7.5萬個公屋單位建屋目標::75000","area_opacity":0.5,"chart_type":"area","color.categorical_palette":["#1d6996","#cc503e","#edad08","#73af48","#94346e","#38a6a5","#e17c05","#5f4690","#0f8554","#6f4070","#994e95","#666666"],"facet_header_color":null,"height_mode":"aspect","labels":false,"layout.footer_logo_enabled":false,"layout.footer_note":"梁振英任期為12/13至16/17年度，林鄭月娥任期是17/18至21/22年度","layout.footer_note_secondary":"註：根據運房局21年3月預測，林鄭任期第四年（20/21年度）有6300個公屋單位落成；第5年（21/22年度）將有2.26萬個單位落成","layout.header_logo_enabled":true,"layout.header_logo_height":5.5,"layout.header_logo_src":"https://public.flourish.studio/uploads/615f6fcf-e0e1-41ba-b488-2b968d9b46a8.png","layout.header_text":"","layout.source_label":"資料來源：","layout.source_name":"運房局；部份數字包括綠置居單位","layout.subtitle":"林鄭月娥任期內預計將累建逾7萬個公屋單位","layout.title":"前特首梁振英任內曾提出5年建7.5萬個公屋單位；最終累計建成6.28萬個單位","layout.title_size":"2","layout.title_styling":true,"line_curve":"curveNatural","line_end_labels":false,"line_interpolate":true,"line_labels.hide_overlaps":true,"shade_between_lines":false,"x.title":"在任年期","x.title_color":"#222020","x.title_styling":true,"y.gridlines_visible":true,"y.linear_max":80000,"y.title":"公營房屋實質建屋量","y.title_color":"#b3b3b3","y.title_size":0.8,"y.title_styling":true}
